comments:
CTRL+SPACE should toggle the selection of treeitems in the variables view.
Instead, it invokes content assist which blocks normal windows keystrokes in a
platform widget. Commands in the details pane should only be active when it has
focus.

Also causes an NPE when a variable has a null value and CTRL-SPACE is pressed:

Fixed in VariablesView and JavaDebugUtils. The fix listens to focus gain/loss 
to register the content assist key handler.
